DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of fluconazole for the treatment of tinea capitis in pediatric patients aged 3 to 12 years.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Diflucan In Children With Ringworm Of The Scalp
DOC.criteria: Pediatric patients (aged 312 years) Clinical diagnosis of tinea capitis Direct microscopy (KOH) positive for fungal elements within or outside hair shaft Negative baseline KOH Liver disease
